title: Fire Snarls Air Traffic Through Chicago
teaser: A fire at an FAA radar center near Chicago halted flights at O'Hare and Midway airports this morning.
contentencoded:
A fire at an FAA radar center near Chicago halted flights at O’Hare and Midway airports this morning, backing up air travel across the Midwest.

A man with self-inflicted wounds was found inside that radar center. Officials are investigating.

WBEZ’s Sean Kennedy joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson with the latest developments.

Guest

  • Sean Kennedy, WBEZ reporter. He tweetsÂ @stkennedy.
